Post-Match Reflections: Paul George expressed his dissatisfaction with playing as a center in a small-ball lineup due to Joel Embiid's injury.
George mentioned that he is 'bored' playing the center position and prefers matchups with wing players.
George highlighted his struggle with the new role, noting that he enjoys scrapping, running around, and fighting through screens more than guarding centers.
George's comments suggest he is not comfortable filling in for Embiid during his absence.
